channel.title: How can i make my server read itemvalue
channel.description:
Okay, im trying to developa minigame where you and your oponent as to be worth a spcific amount by itemvalue.I get a error i guess because the server doesnt know what the value is.here is an example of my method... [code] public void pvPDrops() { int pvpvaluez = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems[i]-1)); if(combatLevel >= 101 && combatLevel <= 126 && pvpvaluez = 300000){ addItem(Item.randomPvP(), 1); } }[/code] pvpvaluez = 300000...i guess it cannot read that.
Heres the error i get :: Preparing for compile... :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... :: :: Found JDK 1.6.0_07 :: Results: client.java:18: operator && cannot be applied to boolean,int if(combatLevel >= 101 && combatLevel <= 126 && pvpvaluez = 300000){ ^ 1 error :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .
These are the drop tables.Combat lvl, how much your worth, and what drop table you may get.The mroe worth you are the combat, then the higher chance for a good item liek vesta long.Vice versa.If you know thanks.

item.title: How can i make my server read itemvalue
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Well, that was helpfull.

and you can’t use the “&&” operator in a int like you did in your method.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make my server read itemvalue

item.title: How can i make my server read itemvalue
item.dc:creator: @dontreadthis dontreadthis
item.description:
@dontreadthis wrote:

Okay, im trying to developa minigame where you and your oponent as to be worth a spcific amount by itemvalue.I get a error i guess because the server doesnt know what the value is.here is an example of my method…

public void pvPDrops() { int pvpvaluez = (int)Math.floor(GetItemValue(playerItems[i]-1)); if(combatLevel >= 101 && combatLevel <= 126 && pvpvaluez = 300000){ addItem(Item.randomPvP(), 1); } }
pvpvaluez = 300000…i guess it cannot read that.

Heres the error i get
:: Preparing for compile…
:: Auto-setting envriomental variables…
::
:: Scanning for latest JDK version…
::
:: Found JDK 1.6.0_07
:: Results:
client.java:18: operator && cannot be applied to boolean,int
if(combatLevel >= 101 && combatLevel <= 126 && pvpvaluez
= 300000){
^
1 error
:: Done!
Press any key to continue . . .

These are the drop tables.Combat lvl, how much your worth, and what drop table you may get.The mroe worth you are the combat, then the higher chance for a good item liek vesta long.Vice versa.If you know thanks.

Read full topic
